Your VisibleDx application now includes the latest European consensus on ME/CFS diagnosis and treatment, enhancing its evidence base with international perspectives! ğŸš€

The D-A-CH consensus is particularly valuable as it represents the most recent collaborative guidelines from Germany, Austria, and Switzerland medical communities.
